```
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  name: random-refresher
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: random-refresher
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: random-refresher
    spec:
      nodeSelector:            ![1](assets/1.png)
        feature: hw-rng
      containers:
      - image: k8spatterns/random-generator:1.0
        name: random-generator
        command: [ "java", "RandomRunner", "/numbers.txt", "10000", "30" ]
        volumeMounts:          ![2](assets/2.png)
        - mountPath: /host_dev
          name: devices
      volumes:
      - name: devices
        hostPath:              ![3](assets/3.png)
          path: /dev
```
